page.title: 18EDINGTON SCHOOL
page.content: Edington School was first started in 1974.Mr.Gerald Trump was appionted its Headmaster. In a school of this nature and size it is particularly important that members of staff know and understand every pupils strength and weakness and that they are sympathic , yet at the same time firm and fair. There are three boarding houses which are called Chapel Hill Farm ,Old Vicarage and Fair Veiw.Twice a week the boys have games which consists of cricket,rugby and football.At the end of the day the boys go back up to their houses to play out .There are also prefects up at the boarding houses and down at school .The school in 1985 holds 91 on roll and is steadily climbing every year.
